data.title: Facts About Israel - Culture
data.meta_description: Facts about Israel - Culture - Free download as PDF File (.pdf) or read online for free. This document provides an overview of theater and entertainment in Israel. It discusses the origins and development of Hebrew theater beginning in the early 20th century. It describes Israel's active theater scene today, with many professional, regional, and amateur companies performing for large audiences. It highlights some of Israel's leading playwrights and the major professional theaters located in Tel Aviv, Haifa, and Jerusalem. It also briefly mentions other forms of live entertainment like children's theater and puppet shows.
